channel.title: Blabber on JDHeyburn

item.title: Blog Bootstrap
item.description: Howdy! ðŸ‘‹ This site will be an area for me to braindump everything and anything that comes across my mind - although I’ll try my best to keep it tech-focused! The blog platform itself is pretty basic. It is built using Hugo, hosted using GitHub Pages, while served over a custom domain via CloudFlare. While this isn’t exactly anything to brag about, it is only meant to be a quick and easy platform to spin up and get hosted so that I can focus on what really matters… the content!
